original_title: เรือนมยุรา
overview: Nookyoong a girl in the late Ayutthaya period The person who lives in the Ruen Mayura, the wood that has been sheltered, not for anyone to see. And the time in the wooden house will walk slower than the outside time In order to escape the war Time in the Ruen Mayura passed two years, but the outside time passed two hundred years. Nookyoong leaves the house to meet with the new world that she is unfamiliar. And met Pra Nai, a young man who looked and named similar to the people she knew in the past The event leads to love across the national world that both have to overcome and solve the problem.
title: Ruen Mayura
